div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 48 Andritsaena, Elis, 1948 Burial: c. 380 B.C. (Seltman) Contents: 111+ AR Thebes: 2 st. Sicyon: 3 st. Elis: 75 st. 31 fr. Disposition: dispersed Seltman, NC 1951, pp. 40-55, illus. (Katoch√© hd.) List of types of 67 st., 17 fr. in ANS
